docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Enum: DepartmentCodelist
docs.text:
URI: DepartmentCodelist

This is a dynamic enum

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Description department

docs.title: Annotations
docs.text: property value ex_12345.date 2025-05-22 ex_12345.version 1 ex_98765.date 2025-05-20 ex_9876.version 2 value_set.metadata date, 2025-05-22, version, 2

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://example.org/derived_schema

docs.title: LinkML Source
docs.text:
name: department_codelist
annotations:
  ex_12345.date:
    tag: ex_12345.date
    value: 2025-05-22
  ex_12345.version:
    tag: ex_12345.version
    value: 1
  ex_98765.date:
    tag: ex_98765.date
    value: 2025-05-20
  ex_9876.version:
    tag: ex_9876.version
    value: 2
  value_set.metadata:
    tag: value_set.metadata
    value: date, 2025-05-22, version, 2
from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
exact_mappings:
- ex:12345
- ex:98765
rank: 1000

docs.title: Class: DerivedEmployee
docs.text:
A person employed by an organization.

URI: ex:DerivedEmployee

 classDiagram
    class DerivedEmployee
    click DerivedEmployee href "../DerivedEmployee"
      Person <|-- DerivedEmployee
        click Person href "../Person"

      DerivedEmployee : department





        DerivedEmployee --> "0..1" DepartmentCodelist : department
        click DepartmentCodelist href "../DepartmentCodelist"



      DerivedEmployee : employee_id

      DerivedEmployee : gender





        DerivedEmployee --> "0..1" GenderEnum : gender
        click GenderEnum href "../GenderEnum"



      DerivedEmployee : id

      DerivedEmployee : name

docs.title: Inheritance
docs.text:
• Person
    • DerivedEmployee

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance employee_id 0..1  String direct department 0..1  DepartmentCodelist direct id 1  String Person name 1  String Person gender 0..1  GenderEnum Person

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://example.org/derived_schema

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self ex:DerivedEmployee native ex:DerivedEmployee

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: derived_Employee
description: A person employed by an organization.
from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
is_a: Person
attributes:
  employee_id:
    name: employee_id
    from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - derived_Employee
    range: string
  department:
    name: department
    from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - derived_Employee
    range: department_codelist

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: derived_Employee
description: A person employed by an organization.
from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
is_a: Person
attributes:
  employee_id:
    name: employee_id
    from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: employee_id
    owner: derived_Employee
    domain_of:
    - derived_Employee
    range: string
  department:
    name: department
    from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: department
    owner: derived_Employee
    domain_of:
    - derived_Employee
    range: department_codelist
  id:
    name: id
    from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
    rank: 1000
    identifier: true
    alias: id
    owner: derived_Employee
    domain_of:
    - Person
    - Education
    range: string
  name:
    name: name
    from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: name
    owner: derived_Employee
    domain_of:
    - Person
    range: string
    required: true
  gender:
    name: gender
    from_schema: https://example.org/derived_schema
    rank: 1000
    alias: gender
    owner: derived_Employee
    domain_of:
    - Person
    range: GenderEnum
